channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12817] Data missing while scanning using PREFIX_TREE data block encoding
item.description:
write a testcase like this


  @Test

  public void test() throws IOException {

    for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) {

      region.put(new Put(Bytes.toBytes("obj" + (2900 + i))).add(fam, qual1, Bytes.toBytes(i)));

    }

    region.put(new Put(Bytes.toBytes("obj299")).add(fam, qual1, Bytes.toBytes("whatever")));

    region.put(new Put(Bytes.toBytes("obj29")).add(fam, qual1, Bytes.toBytes("whatever")));

    region.put(new Put(Bytes.toBytes("obj2")).add(fam, qual1, Bytes.toBytes("whatever")));

    region.put(new Put(Bytes.toBytes("obj3")).add(fam, qual1, Bytes.toBytes("whatever")));

    region.flushcache(true);

    Scan scan = new Scan(Bytes.toBytes("obj29995"));

    RegionScanner scanner = region.getScanner(scan);

    List<Cell> cells = new ArrayList<Cell>();

    assertFalse(scanner.next(cells));

    assertArrayEquals(Bytes.toBytes("obj3"), Result.create(cells).getRow());

  }

use obj29995 to scan should return obj3, but obj2990 is returned.

Seems a bug introduced by the fix of HBASE-11728.
item.summary: Data missing while scanning using PREFIX_TREE data block encoding

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Thanks for filing this Duo Zhang. Are you working on a patch for this?
Yep, the patch will be ready soon.

+1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12690538/HBASE-12817.patch
against master branch at commit 7bff9efdd9916daa442439c62e0560989d18862b.

looks fine to me. a nice simplification.

0.98 and branch-1 need separate patches.

Thanks for the patch, Duo.

The previous patch contains System.out used for debugging, sorry.

Use the new patch please, thanks.

I think the patch for branch-1 could also be applied to branch-1.0, if not please let me know and I will prepare a patch for branch-1.0.

Thanks.
